@usedefaults

{{vmachine: id:$$id}}

{{actions:

[[actions]]
action = "\/restmachine\/cloudbroker\/machine\/start"
input = [ "reason",]
display = "Start"
[actions.data]
machineId = "$$id"
spaceName = "$$spacename"
accountName = "$$accountname"

[[actions]]
action = "\/restmachine\/cloudbroker\/machine\/stop"
input = [ "reason",]
display = "Stop"
[actions.data]
machineId = "$$id"
spaceName = "$$spacename"
accountName = "$$accountname"

[[actions]]
action = "\/restmachine\/cloudbroker\/machine\/destroy"
input = [ "reason",]
display = "Delete"
[actions.data]
machineId = "$$id"
spaceName = "$$spacename"
accountName = "$$accountname"
}}

h2. vMachine: $$name

|*ID*| $$id|
|*Description*| $$descr|
|*CPU Node*| [$$stackrefid|stack?id=$$stackid]|
|*Account*| [$$accountname|account?id=$$accountid]|
|*Cloudspace*| [$$spacename|cloudspace?id=$$cloudspaceid]|
|*Created at*| $$createdat|
|*Deleted at*| $$deletedat|
|*Size*| $$size|
|*Image*| $$image|
|*Status*| $$status|
|*Host Name*| $$hostname|
|*Hypervisor Type*| $$hypervisortype|
*NICs*
$$nics
*Disks*
$$disks

|*Status*|$$stats_state|
